statements: UPDATE user_accounts SET username = 'new_username' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'new_email@example.com', last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', last_login = NOW() WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE user_accounts SET password_hash = 'newpasswordhash123', registration_date = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sessions SET updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', password = 'securepassword123' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sessions SET created_at = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', updated_at = DEFAULT WHERE session_id = 'c7b8be3f-2924-4f18-b5e0-4eab076a7a26';
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = '1a72f2e7-6b20-4a4b-b831-8ceb5d4647a2';
UPDATE user_profiles SET display_name = 'John Doe', bio = 'A software engineer' WHERE user_id = '7b38e245-d1f1-4093-a0db-81a8a32750b9';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET avatar_url = 'https://example.com/avatar.jpg', bio = 'New bio text' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET password_hash='new_password' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE user_profile SET last_login='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', email='johndoe@example.com', date_joined='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE user_profile SET display_name='John Smith', profile_picture_url='https://example.com/profile_pic.jpg', bio='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.', last_login='2022-01-20 15:45:00' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET language='spanish', theme='dark' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE player_profiles SET xp=xp+100 WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username='john_doe')
